resources.string: We need to have access to the camera to see your cute smile!
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Google Play services is needed and correct version can\'t be installed on your device.
Some requirements are not available yet on your device. There are downloading as soon as you have some available network access. Please relaunch the application later.
We don\'t have to the camera. Please try to relaunch the application later.
